io.wcm.qa.glnm.selectors.base

Class AbstractNestedSelectorBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.qa.glnm.selectors.base.AbstractSelectorBase
      • io.wcm.qa.glnm.selectors.base.AbstractNestedSelectorBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NestedSelector, Selector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SelectorFromLocator

    public class AbstractNestedSelectorBase
extends AbstractSelectorBase
implements NestedSelector
    Abstract base class for NestedSelector implementations.
    Since:
    1.0.0
